title: India doubles down on state-backed venture capital, approving $1.1B fund
description: India’s $1.1B fund-of-funds will invest through private VCs to support deep-tech and manufacturing startups.
content: India’s $1.1B fund-of-funds will invest through private VCs to support deep-tech and manufacturing startups.
